attributes.additional_details: Seeing children are getting free meals why not pensioners.. Come on every body stick up for pensioners we are the ones that are getting a raw deal out of the coalition: no tax breaks.. no tax breaks next year either.. also all pensioners are having to pay extra tax not this year but next year so we will be worse off.  Come on Coalition government YOU are doing a great job BUT beware there could be a backlash from pensioners in the next election. Look after the old as you are looking after the young maybe to tune of over £400 per year.
